text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Who are these “unnamed” world leaders who (as you repeatedly mentioned during the briefing) called to offer praise for your pathetic handling of the Coronavirus outbreak. We, the American people demand names.  Who are these “fake leaders” you claim called. https://t.co/9Wxc7nS4Yh
